content: and join the yarn in that stitch row 1 single_crochet in same st as join and in next 3 single_crochet chain 4 skip 6 stitches single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 8sc ch4 space row 2 chain 1 turn 4sc 4sc in chain 4 space 4 single_crochet 12 single_crochet row 3 turn don t chain 1 skip 1st single_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet chain 4 counts as 1 treble_crochet chain treble_crochet chain in next 5 single_crochet leave last 3 single_crochet unworked 1 unworked 2 slip_stitch 6 treble_crochet chain 3 unworked = 12 sts row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each treble_crochet chain across single_crochet in top of chain 4 6 single_crochet fasten_off border around the skull go back to the top of the skull where you left off at the stitch marker chain 1 then evenly single_crochet all the way around the skull work 2 single_crochet into the corners at the cheeks and bottom of the jaw for smoother transitions 52 single_crochet finish off with the invisible join or with a slip_stitch into the starting chain weave in the ends and lightly block to the correct shape enjoy original interpretation by robin brzozowski for crochet nirvana  inspiration for pattern from post www crochetnirvana weebly com/blog found on https //www facebook com/clubedascrochedeiras crochetnirvana@hotmail com pictures copyright © 2013 crochet nirvana  please do not reproduce / repost without permission original interpretation by robin brzozowski for crochet nirvana  inspiration for pattern from post www crochetnirvana weebly com/blog found on https //www facebook com/clubedascrochedeiras crochetnirvana@hotmail com pictures copyright © 2013 crochet nirvana  please do not reproduce / repost without permission
